dcterms:description: Long-term wireless emission metadata in the 800-900MHz band collected for a span of 2 months from a first geographical location with a frequency scanning receiver. The dataset contains 11670, 5002, 7146 time intervals in a sequential manner for training, validation, and test sets respectively, with the test set containing 3894 benign and 3738 anomalies.
dcterms:title: LTW1

dcterms:description: Long-term wireless emission metadata collected from a second geographical location, similar to LTW1. The dataset spans a time interval of 10 days and forms 1645, 706, 1310 sequential time intervals for training, validation, and test sets respectively, with the test set containing 786 benign and 724 anomalies.
dcterms:title: LTW2

dcterms:description: Short-term wireless emission metadata collected from a third geographical location comprising short-time high-rate observations of 900MHz cellular and ISM bands. The dataset contains 154, 39, 198 training, validation, and testing instances respectively, with the test set containing 94 benign and 104 anomalies.
dcterms:title: STW1

dcterms:creator: L. Deng
dcterms:description: A standard image dataset for machine learning research comprising images of hand-written digits. The training and validation set consists of 4089 and 1753 images of the number ‘4’ (benign class) respectively. During testing, all other classes of digits are considered anomalies.
dcterms:title: MNIST
